Summary: GERMANY: Bluu Unit, a group of refrigeration, air conditioning and ventilation firms, has bolstered its German footprint by acquiring Düsseldorf-based ACI Group and Heuberger Kälte Klima GmbH from Bayreuth.

Title: Lib Dems call to heatproof the NHS
Summary: UK: With an increasing number of heat related deaths amongst older people, the Liberal Democrat party has called on the UK government to ensure all care homes are air conditioned.

Title: Trane Technologies Reports Strong Second Quarter Results; Raises Full-Year Revenue and EPS Guidance
Summary: Highlights (second-quarter 2025 versus second-quarter 2024, unless otherwise noted):

Title: Trane Technologies Recognized as a Leading Employer in the U.S. and India by Great Place to Work®
Summary: Not Available -- Link leads to another site.

Title: Trane Technologies Schedules Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Conference Call
Summary: Trane Technologies plc (NYSE:TT), a global climate innovator, will host a conference call to discuss its second quarter 2025 financial results on Wednesday, July 30, 2025, at 10 a.m. ET. The company will issue its second quarter earnings release and earnings presentation in advance of the call; both will be available on the Trane Technologies website.

Title: Trane Technologies Recognized by TIME as One of the World’s Most Sustainable Companies
Summary: Trane Technologies (NYSE:TT), a global climate innovator, has been recognized in TIME’s list of the World’s Most Sustainable Companies, ranking 20th. The list, now in its second year and published in collaboration with market research company Statista, highlights the top 500 companies that embed sustainability into their core strategies.

Title: Trane Technologies’ Cal Krause Named to Trellis 30 Under 30 List
Summary: Not Available -- Link leads to another site.

Title: Danfoss introduces Thorx CLM 5 C cam lobe motor, a breakthrough in efficiency and performance for road rollers
Summary: The CLM 5 C motor features a robust, novel design that eliminates leakage, enables smoother road finishing, reduces service issues, and extends component lifetime.

Title: Boost HVAC performance effortlessly: Smart VFDs for AHU and BMS
Summary: Danfoss presents new features of VLT® HVAC Drive FC 102, that enhance the functionality of air handling units (AHU) and rooftop units (RTU), for simplicity in installation, operation, and energy efficiency in a Building Management System (BMS) concept. Importantly, FC 102 indicates the operational performance of the AHU Specific Fan Power (SFP) to document operation efficiency, in compliance with the EN16798 standard.

Title: TurbocorCloud®: smart, connected compressors for enhanced performance
Summary: Danfoss introduces TurbocorCloud®, a cloud solution designed to enhance the performance of Turbocor® compressors through smart, connected technology. This platform provides users with seamless remote access to optimize compressor systems efficiently, effectively reducing the need for site visits.

Title: Danfoss Drives enables the green transition, one EV tugboat at a time
Summary: JAPAN: Danfoss Drives is proud to drive the building of an EV tugboat and a battery shore supply system, taking another step towards meeting the 2050 IMO standard.

Title: Danfoss iC7 Series Powers New Electric Ferry 'Nerthus'
Summary: The newly launched electric ferry Nerthus sets sail, featuring Danfoss Drives’ latest iC7 series as a key part of its all-electric propulsion system, highlighting Danfoss’ strong role in the green transition of maritime transport.

Title: Danfoss Power Solutions celebrates 20th anniversary of flagship H1P pump
Summary: The H1P axial piston pump is renowned for its unmatched reliability, high efficiency, compact design, and precise control. Danfoss has produced 1.7 million H1P pumps since its launch, and continues to invest in the portfolio today.

Title: Danfoss unveils state-of-the-art water test lab to deliver tailored nozzle performance testing for customers
Summary: A dedicated water lab was developed and installed in our Nordborg production site in Denmark to test the performance of various water nozzle configurations for customers. This setup allows us to validate product efficiency under diverse use cases like humidification, dust control, and adiabatic cooling.

Title: Drive performance, efficiency, and innovation with Danfoss at iVT Expo Cologne 2025
Summary: Danfoss Power Solutions will highlight its latest technologies for off- and on-highway machinery at iVT Expo 2025, June 11-12, in Cologne, Germany. Visit the company at booth 2000.

Title: Intelligent heating made simple: Danfoss and E.ON One join forces
Summary: Danfoss and E.ON One present an all-in-one solution combining hardware and software that saves up to 30% energy and enables significant CO₂ reductions for both existing and new buildings.

Title: Danfoss welcomes Danish Foreign Minister Lars Løkke Rasmussen to landmark factory visit in Tianjin, China
Summary: As part of a high-level visit to China, Danish Minister for Foreign Affairs, Lars Løkke Rasmussen, toured Danfoss’ pioneering factory in Tianjin on May 18, highlighting the strong economic ties between Denmark and China and the role of green innovation in their future cooperation.
